(BTW, thanks for the ideas on Spears, this could be interesting)

::Spears::
She came out of stasis lock, but was still unconsious.  She started 
muttering in her sleep, "Prebon...Striker....Slayer..."
The chips had fought with her programs and were starting to make a 
new format for her. The chips had found a way to make the programs co-
exist in her circuits and programs. 

A small ribbon of smoke escaped from her head armor. 

Some of her internal circuits were fried.  But most were still intact 
and running.  Her main maximal program was in a, now seperate, 
operating program. Her new trainer program was functioning on it's 
own in another seperate program.  Most of her logic circuits had 
sustained a lot of damage and some were still smoldering.  Her 
maximal program was strong, but the trainer program was equally 
strong.  She now had to programs fighting for control.  

Her fist clenched up and her optics flickered as the programs fought 
inside her.
